Header: The Prime Minister tweets on Ladakh
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has said that the creation of Ladakh as a Union Territory is an internal matter of India. The Indian government on Monday revoked Article 370 which gave special status to Jammu and Kashmir and moved a separate bill to split the state into two union territories of Jammu, Kashmir and Ladakh.The Prime Minister said that he understandsLadakh will finally become an Indian state. He added that Buddhists are 70 per cent of Ladakh’s population and it will be the first Indian state with Buddhist majority.The Prime Minister said that he has been to Ladakh and “it is really worth a visit, he added.
